subtitle: The Crib (Main Admin Building)
content: This is where the big cheese (administration) hangs out. Don't get caught crashin' their pad unless you got a legit reason (like snagging a scholarship or dodging a parking ticket).

subtitle: The Brain Trust (Library)
content: Need to cram for finals or avoid that awkward hallway run-in with your ex? This is your haven. Just shhh, keep it low-key, knowledge seekers!

subtitle: The Code Forge (CS Block)
content: Where tech wizards and keyboard warriors craft the future (or at least learn how to code).

subtitle: The Knowledge Hub (F Block & Tan Block)
content: Dive deep into whatever floats your academic boat - history, literature, you name it! Just don't get lost in the rabbit hole.

subtitle: The Dorms (Hostels)
content: Brace yourself for a wild ride, from late-night study sessions fueled by questionable instant ramen to epic parties that'll leave you reminiscing (or regretting) for years to come.

subtitle: The Grub Hub (Canteen & Street Cafe)
content: Where sustenance meets questionable hygiene. But hey, desperate times call for greasy spoon delights and questionable coffee.

subtitle: The Feasting Ground (Aahar)
content: Heard rumors of legendary buffets and questionable dining etiquette? This, my friend, is where the magic (and occasional food coma) happens.

subtitle: The Stadium Showdown (Cricket Ground)
content: Witness epic battles between rival dorms or cheer on your uni's team as they dominate the pitch (hopefully).

subtitle: The Cardio Circus (Synthetic Track & Batting Ground)
content: Get your fitness fix and maybe impress that cutie with your impressive running form (or hilarious strikeout attempts).

subtitle: The Oasis (Lawns)
content: Escape the hustle and bustle with a frisbee throw or a nap under the shady trees. Just be prepared for surprise frisbee attacks or territorial squirrels.

subtitle: The Marketplace (Cos)
content: Need a last-minute phone charger, a questionable souvenir, or just a friendly face? This is your one-stop shop (except for actual groceries, because...questionable).

subtitle: The Bhakti Maarg (Mandir/Gurudwara Sahib)
content: Find inner peace (or a quiet place to nap) at this place of worship. Remember, silence is golden (especially during prayer times).
